Issue.creator: mfaisaltariq
Issue.summary: Channel Creation Fails with PKCS11 BCCSP
Issue.description: ERRO 001 Cannot run peer because error when setting up MSP of type bccsp from directory /data/adminOrg1MSP/: KeyMaterial not found in SigningIdentityInfo{color} The orderer logs can be found at Logs|https://privatebin.net/?2a1ab797b21f34fc#2BiosfM2oBgnptx4PKfK6S3U52JqPvfRkJxLCggVBJBm The peer logs can be found at Peer Logs|https://privatebin.net/?2941c56ef8ee058e#Bm12KkBitCMywbNNnjp1hdUhUs2FUprqA7wnRCn3av77 >
